articles.author: Olivia Hebert
articles.title: 'Dangerous' Chagas disease confirmed in California, raising concerns for Bay Area - SFGATE
articles.description: Experts are worried that Chagas, a parasitic disease endemic to Latin America, will come to the Bay Area after cases were confirmed in Southern California.
articles.content:
A Conenose bug or kissing bug.
California Department of Public Health/Getty Images/iStockphoto
A parasitic disease endemic to Latin America has now been confirmed in California, according to state … [+3003 chars]

articles.title: Anisimova avenges Wimbledon loss, knocks off Swiatek to reach US Open semis - WTA Tennis
articles.description: Playing Iga Swiatek for the first time since her 6-0, 6-0 loss in the Wimbledon final earlier this summer, American Amanda Anisimova upset the six-time Grand Slam champion 6-4, 6-3 to exact revenge and advance to her first career US Open semifinal.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- After her fourth-round win over Beatriz Haddad Maia on Labor Day, Amanda Anisimova said in her on-court interview that she had hoped for a bit more love from the New York crowd.
She got … [+2710 chars]

articles.author: Gabrielle Fonrouge
articles.title: American Eagle stock soars 20% as retailer says Sydney Sweeney campaign is 'best' to date, beats earnings - CNBC
articles.description: American Eagle said its Sydney Sweeney campaign is its best ever, leading to positive gains in new customers, sales and foot traffic.
articles.content:
American Eagle said Wednesday its partnership with Sydney Sweeney has been its "best" advertising campaign to date as it announced fiscal second-quarter earnings that beat expectations.
